name: Un-Stabled (Mathias Boeckx (DenHette))
description:
Explode your way out of the slowly destabilizing stables! You’re a floppy horse and your only way to move is by dropping bombs around yourself.

See the madness for yourself: https://imgur.com/a/v0jormT

Everything in the game is made by members of the team:

  • Stefan Spruyt
  • Mathias Boeckx
  • Conan Dufour

This has been our first game(jam), but we’re pretty pleased with what we’ve been able to make. It’d be awesome if you guys check it out and leave a rating!

Includes 7 exciting levels and a bonus for completion. Share your best times for a bit of friendly competition!
